name: Dreadful Carnage
descriptionText: Slaying an enemy demoralizes your other nearby foes.
benefitText: Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 or fewer hit points, you can make an Intimidate check to demoralize all enemies within 30 feet as a free action. Enemies that cannot see both you and the enemy you reduced to 0 or fewer hit points are unaffected.
